## Wrapper() function

> This API is provided as an alpha preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Wraps the combined country code selector's subcomponents into MUI's `Grid`<!-- -->, `Grid2` or `FormGroup` components according to the `layout` prop's value.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export default function Wrapper({ layout, formGroupProps, gridContainerProps, gridItemProps, gridSelectorProps, gridInputProps, gridErrorProps, grid2ContainerProps, grid2ItemProps, grid2SelectorProps, grid2InputProps, grid2ErrorProps, stackProps, selectorSize, inputSize, errorSize, children, }: WrapperProps): import("react/jsx-runtime").JSX.Element;
```
